content: How can I turn off running CI on a draft pull request on GitHub? I already know that it's going to fail because there are still a few unimplemented!() statements in there, and it's just wasting computational resources every time I push a new commit.
@Bram van den Heuvel if you're worried about wasting compute time you could indent with tabs or something so it fails early
but I wouldn't worry too much about it
